title: RIOT JUST ATE MY MONEY
body: ok.. so i bought $10 rp. It said thx for purchasing when i bought it but it doesn't show on my rp.. and when i try to buy the skin(under $10 rp) it says i don't have enough rp to buy it . What should i do rito??

replies.body: restart client, wait for it to take time to appear
Did more than 10 times and it has been 20 min already
Please send in a support ticket, they'll gladly help you sort this out.

I'm pretty sure you send a support ticket here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
the support category at the top of the page of the league of legends website, navigate your way to make a ticket and follow the instructions.
Off topic, but I love your icon c:
It's 1500 IP in the shop right now. I'd grab it if I were you :D

Haven't been able to get onto the client for a while, patch issues and such.

Thanks :)

When I first read the thread's name I thought it said:

''RIOT JUST ATE MY MONKEY''

As you might be able to guess, I laughed.
Thought it'd let you know.
For no particular reason.
{{summoner:31}}
